changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS resources ( resource_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT generate_nanoid(), title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, resource_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, mime_type VARCHAR(20), file_size BIGINT NOT NULL, storage_path TEXT NOT NULL, uploaded_by VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT resource_pkey PRIMARY KEY (resource_id) )
